org.qualitune.naoservice.client
Class Nao.ALLeds

java.lang.Object
  org.qualitune.naoservice.client.Nao.ALLeds
Enclosing class:
Nao
public class Nao.ALLeds
extends java.lang.Object

ALLeds contains helper methods for controlling the Light Emiting Devices (LEDs).

Wait for the end of a long running method that was called using 'post'

Parameters:
id - The ID of the method that was returned when calling the method using 'post'

Actual SDK return value:True if the timeout period terminated. False if the method returned.

earLedsSetAngle

public org.json.JSONObject earLedsSetAngle(int degrees,
                                           float duration,
                                           boolean leaveonatend)
An animation to show a direction with the ears.

Parameters:
degrees - The angle you want to show in degrees (int). 0 is up, 90 is forwards, 180 is down and 270 is back.
duration - The duration in seconds of the animation.
leaveOnAtEnd - If true the last led is left on at the end of the animation.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)

                                float intensity,

Parameters:

fadeListRGB

public org.json.JSONObject fadeListRGB(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String rgblist,
                                       java.lang.String timelist)
Chain a list of color for a device, as the motion.doMove command.

Parameters:
name - The name of the LED or Group.
rgbList - List of RGB led value, RGB as seen in hexa-decimal: 0x00RRGGBB.
timeList - List of time to go to given intensity.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)

fadeRGB

public org.json.JSONObject fadeRGB(java.lang.String name,
                                   int rgb,
                                   float duration)
Sets the intensity of a led. If the name matches an RGB led, all channels are set to the same value.

Parameters:
name - The name of the LED or Group.
rgb - The RGB value led, RGB as seen in hexa-decimal: 0x00RRGGBB.
duration - Time used to fade in seconds.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)

timeForRotation - Approximate time to make one turn.
totalDuration - Approximate duration of the animation in seconds.
